verses.verse: וּבָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> And at that time הַהִיא֩ <S%H1931><s%> who יַעֲמֹ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> stand up מִֽיכָאֵ֜ל <S%H4317><s%> shall Michael הַשַּׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> prince הַגָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the great הָעֹמֵד֮ <S%H5975><s%> which standeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> for the children עַמֶּךָ֒ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people וְהָיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> and there shall be עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> a time צָרָ֔ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> such לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> never נִהְיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> occurred מִֽהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> occurred גּ֔וֹי <S%H1471><s%> such as never was since there was a nation עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until הָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> [even] to that same time הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> that וּבָעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> and at that time הַהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he יִמָּלֵ֣ט <S%H4422><s%> shall be delivered עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> thy people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone הַנִּמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> every one that shall be found כָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> written בַּסֵּֽפֶר׃ <S%H5612><s%> in the book

וְרַבִּ֕ים <S%H7227><s%> And many מִיְּשֵׁנֵ֥י <S%H3463><s%> of them that sleep אַדְמַת־ <S%H127><s%> of the earth עָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> in the dust יָקִ֑יצוּ <S%H6974><s%> shall awake אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לְחַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> life עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> some to everlasting וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> the others לַחֲרָפ֖וֹת <S%H2781><s%> and some to shame לְדִרְא֥וֹן <S%H1860><s%> contempt עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> [and] everlasting ס

וְהַ֨מַּשְׂכִּלִ֔ים <S%H7919><s%> And they that be wise יַזְהִ֖רוּ <S%H2094><s%> shall shine כְּזֹ֣הַר <S%H2096><s%> as the brightness הָרָקִ֑יעַ <S%H7549><s%> of the firmament וּמַצְדִּיקֵי֙ <S%H6663><s%> to righteousness הָֽרַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> and they that turn many כַּכּוֹכָבִ֖ים <S%H3556><s%> as the stars לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you דָֽנִיֵּ֗אל <S%H1840><s%> But thou O Daniel סְתֹ֧ם <S%H5640><s%> shut up הַדְּבָרִ֛ים <S%H1697><s%> the words וַחֲתֹ֥ם <S%H2856><s%> and seal הַסֵּ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the book עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> [even] to the time קֵ֑ץ <S%H7093><s%> of the end יְשֹׁטְט֥וּ <S%H7751><s%> shall run to and fro רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> many וְתִרְבֶּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> shall be increased הַדָּֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> and knowledge

וְרָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> looked אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I דָנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> Then I Daniel וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> two אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> other עֹמְדִ֑ים <S%H5975><s%> and behold there stood אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> the one הֵ֙נָּה֙ <S%H2008><s%> on this side לִשְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> of the bank הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> of the river וְאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> and the other הֵ֖נָּה <S%H2008><s%> this לִשְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> on that side of the bank הַיְאֹֽר׃ <S%H2975><s%> of the river

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And [one] said לָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> to the man לְב֣וּשׁ <S%H3847><s%> clothed הַבַּדִּ֔ים <S%H906><s%> in linen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who מִמַּ֖עַל <S%H4605><s%> which [was] upon לְמֵימֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> the waters הַיְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> of the river עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until מָתַ֖י <S%H4970><s%> How קֵ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> How long [shall it be to] the end הַפְּלָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6382><s%> marvellous thing

וָאֶשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> And I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> the man לְב֣וּשׁ <S%H3847><s%> clothed הַבַּדִּ֗ים <S%H906><s%> in linen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who מִמַּעַל֮ <S%H4605><s%> which [was] upon לְמֵימֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> the waters הַיְאֹר֒ <S%H2975><s%> of the river וַיָּ֨רֶם <S%H7311><s%> when he held up יְמִינ֤וֹ <S%H3225><s%> his right hand וּשְׂמֹאלוֹ֙ <S%H8040><s%> and his left hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> unto heaven וַיִּשָּׁבַ֖ע <S%H7650><s%> and sware בְּחֵ֣י <S%H2416><s%> by him that liveth הָעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> would be for לְמוֹעֵ֨ד <S%H4150><s%> that [it shall be] for a time מֽוֹעֲדִ֜ים <S%H4150><s%> times וָחֵ֗צִי <S%H2677><s%> and an half וּכְכַלּ֛וֹת <S%H3615><s%> and when he shall have accomplished נַפֵּ֥ץ <S%H5310><s%> to scatter יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> the power עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy תִּכְלֶ֥ינָה <S%H3615><s%> all these [things] shall be finished כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> And I heard וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבִ֑ין <S%H995><s%> but I understood וָאֹ֣מְרָ֔ה <S%H559><s%> not then said אֲדֹנִ֕י <S%H113><s%> I O my Lord מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> what אַחֲרִ֖ית <S%H319><s%> what [shall be] the end אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> of these פ

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go דָּנִיֵּ֑אל <S%H1840><s%> Daniel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for סְתֻמִ֧ים <S%H5640><s%> [are] closed up וַחֲתֻמִ֛ים <S%H2856><s%> and sealed הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> for the words עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> till the time קֵֽץ׃ <S%H7093><s%> of the end

יִ֠תְבָּֽרֲרוּ <S%H1305><s%> shall be purified וְיִֽתְלַבְּנ֤וּ <S%H3835><s%> and made white וְיִצָּֽרְפוּ֙ <S%H6884><s%> and tried רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> Many וְהִרְשִׁ֣יעוּ <S%H7561><s%> shall do wickedly רְשָׁעִ֔ים <S%H7563><s%> but the wicked וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָבִ֖ינוּ <S%H995><s%> shall understand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner רְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> and none of the wicked וְהַמַּשְׂכִּלִ֖ים <S%H7919><s%> but the wise יָבִֽינוּ׃ <S%H995><s%> shall understand

וּמֵעֵת֙ <S%H6256><s%> And from the time הוּסַ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> [sacrifice] shall be taken away הַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> [that] the daily וְלָתֵ֖ת <S%H5414><s%> set up שִׁקּ֣וּץ <S%H8251><s%> and the abomination שֹׁמֵ֑ם <S%H8074><s%> that maketh desolate יָמִ֕ים <S%H3117><s%> days אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> [there shall be] a thousand מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred וְתִשְׁעִֽים׃ <S%H8673><s%> and ninety

אַשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> Blessed הַֽמְחַכֶּ֖ה <S%H2442><s%> [is] he that waiteth וְיַגִּ֑יעַ <S%H5060><s%> and cometh לְיָמִ֕ים <S%H3117><s%> days אֶ֕לֶף <S%H505><s%> to the thousand שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> and five

וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go לַקֵּ֑ץ <S%H7093><s%> till the end וְתָנ֛וּחַ <S%H5117><s%> [be] for thou shalt rest וְתַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> and stand לְגֹרָלְךָ֖ <S%H1486><s%> in thy lot לְקֵ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> at the end הַיָּמִֽין׃ <S%H3117><s%> of the days
